Structs/ReduceWindowPipelineIterator/Ite.name: Iterator
Structs/ReduceWindowPipelineIterator/Ite.abstract: Note: copying this iterator outside of the function will result in undefined behavior!

Structs/DropPipelineIterator.html.name: DropPipelineIterator
Structs/DropPipelineIterator.html.abstract: Skips the first count elements of an underlying iterator.

Structs/InterleavePipelineIterator.html.name: InterleavePipelineIterator
Structs/InterleavePipelineIterator.html.abstract: Interleaves the output of multiple producer pipelines.

Structs/PrefetchPipelineIterator.html.name: PrefetchPipelineIterator
Structs/PrefetchPipelineIterator.html.abstract: Performs upstream work on a background thread, storing prefetched values

Structs/RandomCollectionPipelineIterator.name: RandomCollectionPipelineIterator
Structs/RandomCollectionPipelineIterator.abstract: Returns a random permutation of elements in collection C.

Structs/RandomIndicesIterator.html.name: RandomIndicesIterator
Structs/RandomIndicesIterator.html.abstract: Generates a random purmutation of the integers 0 to count.

Structs/RangePipelineIterator.html.name: RangePipelineIterator
Structs/RangePipelineIterator.html.abstract: A parallel iterator producing a sequence of integers.

Structs/TakePipelineIterator.html.name: TakePipelineIterator
Structs/TakePipelineIterator.html.abstract: Truncates an underlying iterator to the first takeCount elements.

Structs/Zip2PipelineIterator.html.name: Zip2PipelineIterator
Structs/Zip2PipelineIterator.html.abstract: Combines two iterators of types L and R into an iterator producing elements of type (L.Element, R.Element).

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa15PenguinPara.name: pmap(_:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa15PenguinPara.abstract: Makes a new array, where every element in the new array is f(self[i]) for all i in 0..<count.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa15PenguinPara.name: psum()
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa15PenguinPara.abstract: Computes the sum of all the elements in parallel.

Protocols/ThreadPool.html#/s:15PenguinPa.name: pRun(_:)
Protocols/ThreadPool.html#/s:15PenguinPa.abstract: Submit a task to be executed on the threadpool.

Protocols/ThreadPool.html.name: ThreadPool
Protocols/ThreadPool.html.abstract: A ThreadPool allows efficient use of multi-core CPU machines by managing a collection of threads.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: Element
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: The type of the elements to be produced by the iterator.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: next()
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Retrieves the next element in the sequence.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: interleave(cycleCount:workerCount:perWorkerPrefetchCount:f:)
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Interleaves the output of multiple underlying iterators.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: prefetch(_:)
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Prefetch inserts pipeline parallelism into a pipeline iterator.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: collect()
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Runs the iterator, collecting the outputs into an array.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: enumerated()
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Adds a sequentially increasing counter to this pipeline iterator.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: drop(_:)
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Drops the first count elements of the current iterator.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.name: take(_:)
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html#.abstract: Truncates the current iterator to the first count elements.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.name: fromFunction(_:_:)
Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.abstract: Constructs a pipeline iterator type from a generator function.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.name: fromFunction(_:)
Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.abstract: Constructs a pipeline iterator type from a generator function.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.name: _allThreadsStopped()
Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.abstract: Determines if all worker threads started by Pipeline iterators process-wide have been stopped.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.name: range(_:)
Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.abstract: Constructs a sequentially increasing counter covering range range.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.name: range(_:)
Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.abstract: Constructs a sequentially increasing counter covering range range.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.name: zip(_:_:)
Enums/PipelineIterator.html#/s:15Penguin.abstract: Combines two pipeline iterators together to produce a single joined sequence.

Enums/PipelineIterator.html.name: PipelineIterator
Enums/PipelineIterator.html.abstract: PipelineIterator contains methods that are useful for creating PipelineIteratorProtocol types.

Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html.name: PipelineIteratorProtocol
Protocols/PipelineIteratorProtocol.html.abstract: A type that supplies the value of a sequence one at a time.
